LanguageData.BuildSniperRifle.label: 제작 : M24 저격소총 (저격소총)
LanguageData.BuildSniperRifle.description: Builds an ancient pattern military 저격소총. Bolt action, long range, great accuracy and power.\n구경 : 7.62x51mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildM42A_USCM.label: 제작 : M42A 저격소총 (저격소총)
LanguageData.BuildM42A_USCM.description: The M42A 저격소총 is an American-made semi-automatic 저격소총.\n구경 : 7.62x51mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildDragunovSVU.label: 제작 : SVU OTs-03 드라그노프 (저격소총)
LanguageData.BuildDragunovSVU.description: The SVU OTs-03 드라그노프 is a bullpup configuration of the SVD 저격소총. High damage, long range and very good accuracy.\n구경 : 7.62x54mm R
LanguageData.BuildWA2000SpecialistRifle.label: 제작 : 발터 WA 2000 소총 (저격소총)
LanguageData.BuildWA2000SpecialistRifle.description: Builds the 발터 WA 2000 소총, a limited edition ancient 저격소총. Great range, exceptional accuracy, very high damage and very low fire rate.\n구경 : 7.62x51mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildM82Gun.label: 제작 : 배럿 M82A1 SASR (저격소총)
LanguageData.BuildM82Gun.description: Builds the AM 배럿 M82, a recoil-operated semi-automatic anti-materiel 소총. Very high damage, long range and very good accuracy.\n구경 : .50 BMG
LanguageData.BuildTAMSR.label: 제작 : SRS99 AM 저격소총 (저격소총)
LanguageData.BuildTAMSR.description: Builds the SRS99 AM 저격소총, which is more formally known as the Special Applications 소총. Has a very long range with high accuracy and stopping power.\n구경 : 14.5x114mm
LanguageData.BuildARFifty.label: 제작 : 아말라이트 AR-50 (저격소총)
LanguageData.BuildARFifty.description: Builds the 아말라이트 AR-50, which is a heavy, accurate, military-grade bolt-action 소총. Average fire rate, very high damage, high accuracy and long range.\n구경 : .50 BMG
LanguageData.BuildAWP.label: 제작 : 마이크로 디펜스 MD50 (저격소총)
LanguageData.BuildAWP.description: Builds the Micor Defense MD50, an autoloading anti-materiel 소총 with a compact bullpup design. Low fire rate, high range, extremely high damage and high accuracy.\n구경 : .50 BMG
LanguageData.BuildHecateII.label: 제작 : 에카티 II 대물저격총 (저격소총)
LanguageData.BuildHecateII.description: Builds the 에카티 II 대물저격총, a special application scoped 소총 with a long muzzle brake and 목재en stock. Low fire rate, high range, very high damage and high accuracy.\n구경 : .50 BMG
LanguageData.BuildATR.label: 제작 : PTRD-41 소총 (저격소총)
LanguageData.BuildATR.description: Builds the PTRD-41 소총, which is an anti-tank 소총 with special armor piercing penetration rounds.\n구경 : 14.5x114mm
LanguageData.BuildVintorez.label: 제작 : VSS 블러디 커터 (저격소총)
LanguageData.BuildVintorez.description: Builds the VSS 블러디 커터, a special forces 저격소총. Very accurate at long range, has a fast fire rate and a large magazine capacity.\n구경 : 9x39mm Soviet
